summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 730 m), and light levels (up 6101 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1677 m), and light levels (up 8026 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 729.9m lower than yesterday, 647.8m lower than the past week, 1676.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 994.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, humidity should not be a concern. A few light raindrops may fall, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
